exceptions.tactic: intros n m IH1 IH2 H.
intros n' m IH1 IH2 H.

ctx: intros n' m' IH1 IH2 H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m : nat, S n < S m -> n < m" on hypothesis of type "n < S m".

ctx: intros n' m' IH1 IH2 H.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (IH2 m H) as [[q [Hq Hprime]] | Hcontra].
exceptions.exn: In environment H0 : forall n m : nat, S n < S m -> n < m n, m, n', m' : nat IH1 : forall p : nat, nat -> p < n' -> n < S m -> nthprime n < nthprime (S m) IH2 : forall p : nat, p < m' -> n < S m -> nthprime n < nthprime (S m) H : n < S m The term "H" has type "n < S m" while it is expected to have type "m < m'".

ctx: intros n' m' IH1 IH2 H.
exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall n m : nat, S n < S m -> n < m n, m, n', m' : nat IH1 : forall p : nat, nat -> p < n' -> n < S m -> nthprime n < nthprime (S m) IH2 : forall p : nat, p < m' -> n < S m -> nthprime n < nthprime (S m) H : n < S m Unable to unify "S (S ?M2175) <= S ?M2176" with "S (nthprime n) <= nthprime (S m)".

ctx: intros n' m' IH1 IH2 H.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hcontra was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros n' m' IH1 IH2 H.
exceptions.exn: In environment H2 : forall n m : nat, S n < S m -> n < m H0 : forall n m : nat, n < m -> S n < S m n, m, n', m' : nat IH1 : forall p : nat, nat -> p < n' -> n < S m -> nthprime n < nthprime (S m) IH2 : forall p : nat, p < m' -> n < S m -> nthprime n < nthprime (S m) H : n < S m Unable to unify "S (nthprime (S m))" with "S (S (nthprime n))".

original: apply lt_wf_double_rec. intros n m IH1 IH2 H. destruct m. -- inversion H. -- apply lt_S_n in H. destruct (IH2 m H) as [[q [Hq Hprime]] | Hcontra]. ++ simpl. apply lt_n_S. eauto using Nat.lt_trans. ++ apply Hcontra. apply le_n.
